title: Grilling stations, Music room, Lounge with a chef's kitchen, Pool
posting_body: ['Welcome home to The Eddy', 'The Eddy is located along the waterfront in East Boston, boasting unrivaled views of the Boston skyline and within walking distance to an eclectic mix of restaurants, shops and entertainment.', "The Eddy is transit-oriented and serves as a bridge between Boston's most vibrant neighborhoods.", 'Pricing and availability subject to change.', 'Call Now:', '(617) 380-4884 x 2', 'OR Text', '2', 'to', '(617) 380-4884', 'to text our team directly.', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 572.0 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Well-designed living spaces', '- Nest Learning Thermostats™', '- Low-flow fixtures', '- High-efficiency LED lighting', '- Locally-sourced and recycled-content materials', '- Energy Star-rated appliances', 'Community Amenities', '- Music room', '- Bike maintenance facilities', '- Waterfront property with uninterrupted views of the Boston Harbor and city skyline', '- Poolside restaurant service for residents', '- Car sharing options', '- Access to a new waterfront park', '- Dog wash', '- Pool', '- Secure bike parking', '- Private conference rooms', '- Fireplace', '- Well-served by transit through the blue line, an expanded water taxi station, highways and Logan Airport', '- Grilling stations', '- Rooftop deck with seating and 270° views', '- Outdoor terrace', '- Direct access to Lo Presti Park', '- Pet-friendly', '- Sun deck', '- Modern fitness facilities', '- On-site restaurant with indoor and outdoor dining spaces', '- Access to boat landing', "- Lounge with a chef's kitchen", 'The Eddy', '10 New Street , East Boston, MA, 02128', 'YS6nQW97U']
